title: Embroidered CommerceLab Packable Jacket
subtitle: Inspired Shop Builder Clothing
short_desc: Polyester micro poplin, so it's perfect for outdoor sports and adventures. For convenient storage, the zipped hidden pouch pocket pulls out, and the whole jacket can be packed into
long_desc:
• 100% polyester micro poplin
  • Wind and rain resistant
  • Half-zip pullover with a hood
  • Front kangaroo pocket
  • Hidden zipped pouch pocket
  • Packable in the zipped pouch pocket
  • Adjustable bungee drawcord at hood and bottom hem
  • Elastic cuffs
  • Embroidered “C” logo on the left sleeve
  • Available for left chest embroidery
  • Blank product sourced from Vietnam
